title: HMSI launches Grazia125 Repsol Honda Team Edition at Rs 87,138
description: Honda Motorcycle & Scooter India (HMSI) has launched a special edition of its 125 cc scooter Grazia in the country priced at Rs 87,138 (ex-showroom, Gurgaon). The Grazia125 Repsol Honda Team Edition is inspired by the Repsol Honda racing team design theme, graphics and other elements.
